column4: Can somebody help me pleas?  I Just installed a game called Dofus.  It was a exe file and I unziped it onto my computer.  Now I dont know how to "Install" it or play it
run it through wine, as if u were running it on a windows platform
meant for linux? so you probably downloaded the wrong installation file
lietu: there must be some README  or INSTALL file after you unzip the package with instructions
I cant run it throught wine.   for some reason when i go to accesories, the thing that said whine fil isent there
what do you mean? do you run in a terminal and you see any error messages that it writes?
How do i do it in the termanal?
ohhh, it says thats i need flash player for the game to work.  I have no idea how to install flash player
did y ou read the readme file for instructions? there are flash players for linux but maybe they provide better instructions on their own
what about their site? is there a support forum for linux? did you check there?
